thread.title: nmd01
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by nmd01

author: nmd01
title: nmd01
text: In March, 2016, I decided at the last moment to take a rather large group (7 people) to Costa Rica at the height of spring break time. Needless to say, I was unable to find any hotels, flights, etc. I called Molly Stevens at Costa Rican Vacations (whose name was given to me by a friend with whom Molly had worked in the past) and she remarkably was able to find wonderful accommodations, both beachside and at the volcano, as well as convenient flights for my entire group. Transfers were very timely and smooth, and our vacation was really made much better by Molly's intervention. My group was so impressed that we asked Molly to arrange a return trip to Costa Rica again this spring break.
